body: Frankly at the same time as OPTOBAT, I just got 10,000 kills :) , and 11,000 deaths :( , and other people are doing AMAs, so here. I would like to thank jahaj12 for the person I killed the most! (How does that even work?)

title: 10,000 kills! AMA!

replies.body: How any frogs does it take to answer this question?

replies.body:
hahaha Congrats man, feels good doesnt it? :)
Okay, my question is:
Would you rather have 10,000+ kills, 1000+ monuments, or 5th+prestige?
:)
Once again congratulations, we will have to see who can be the first to 15,000 kills and so on :D
replies.body_tagged:
hahaha Congrats man, feels good doesnt it? :)

replies.body:
@source_route  Why not?
@kycrafft  About 21
@OPTOBAT  Thanks. Yes it does feel good, I think they all tie together, but I would rather have a 5th+ prestige because I'm only prestige 1 (almost 2) and I have 10,000 kills. The 5th prestige takes a lot of kills and monuments anyway. Congratulations to you too!
@benconsolver  Thanks!
EDIT: Did the math and I have 321 monuments!
